parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters: [phase: STRING, uid: STRING, number: STRING, handling: STRING, applicantName: STRING, labelCode: STRING, partyExternalReference: STRING, status: STRING]

schema.description: For BO there is only partyExternalReference filter available. For ML-MO and CL-MO rest of filters are available except partyExternalReference. Some fields support multiple values like 'phase' field (see example).

CL - ORIGINATION.value: labelCode eq 'CODE' and (phase eq 'Document assessment' or phase eq 'Final assessment')

ML - ORIGINATION.value: labelCode eq 'CODE' and (phase eq 'Document assessment' or phase eq 'Final assessment')
